NOTES:

This version of game is 1.0.3.2 ,playable Online on Private (Cracked) servers or Single Player .
On "Multiplayer" menu you'll find on Favorites Tab up to 40 servers v_1.0.3.2
added by me manually ,tested,working.
Just click on "Refresh List" and choose server to play online.
Feel free to add more servers or delete some servers from favorites.

THIS GAME IS UPDATED PERIODICALLY ,IF YOU CANNOT CONNECT TO UPDATED SERVERS,
VISIT http://www.aviara.ro AND TAKE THE UPDATE PATCH.


On this version of game you cannot change name from console !!!
In KillingFloor folder ,open rev.ini with notepad ,find line "PlayerName=aviara.ro" and change aviara.ro with your name !!!!

If you have WIN7 and after installing game you have an error on your screen ,
ignore it because the game is installed correctly.
